project_overview.title: Walmart Sales Forecasting - Advanced Analytics Implementation
project_overview.objective: Develop and deploy advanced machine learning models for accurate sales forecasting
project_overview.scope: All Walmart stores and departments with historical sales data

technical_highlights.feature_engineering: 100+ features including temporal, lag, and interaction features
technical_highlights.evaluation_metrics: WMAE (Weighted Mean Absolute Error) with holiday weighting

business_value.inventory_optimization: Reduced inventory costs through better demand prediction
business_value.stockout_reduction: Minimized lost sales due to stockouts
